text:
Created attachment 14781
files to extract into lenya/usecase/cformeditor 

This is cleaned up usecase-cformedit.xmap and formedit.js
usecase xmap takes template/binding/model from 
context://lenya/pubs/{$pub}/config/doctypes/cforms/{$doctype}_template.xml etc
Thus it could be configured for any doctype.
creator: qmax@mediasoft.ru
gregor@apache.org
text:
i applied your patch, with some changes. please review. can you explain a bit
more how you are using this?
